snippet: The company said it decided to ignore signs of suspicious activity flagged by security software last year.
abstract: Target acknowledges that its computer security system had alerted it to suspicious activity after hackers infiltrated its network in 2013, but that company ultimately decided to ignore it; lapse led to one of the largest data breaches ever recorded.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH A. HARRIS and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: The company said it decided to ignore signs of suspicious activity flagged by security software last year.

headline.main: Target Missed Signs of a Data Breach
headline.print_headline: Target Missed Signs of a Data Breach
